tossup_question: -   –  What polymer, consisting of repeating C2H3Cl units, is one of the most widely produced plastics and finds usage in industries from construction to clothing?
bonus_question: -   –  Which of the following is a network solid at the standard atmospheric temperature and pressure?
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) Ammonia
X) Sodium chloride
Y) Silicon carbide
Z) Diborane
